Alice

Group (2025-present):
NWH:I

Introduction

Alice is a Japanese trainee under Na Entertainment and is a member of the upcoming global girl group NWH:I. Alice was the second member revealed, on January 10,2025. She is a former member of the pre-debut girl group DE:VA.
